name: Two Die (itch)
description:
In a dark void you play deadly game with a thing you don't dare to look at. You roll your dice to your squares to get points, but that Thing has squares of its own and the more points it gets, the closer it's hand come to you.

The first to 150 wins, but you only have 5mins.

Press Right Mouse to Retrieve Dice

Hold Left Mouse to Shake Dice

Release Left Mouse while Moving Mouse to Throw Dice

Release Left Mouse while NOT Moving Mouse to Drop Dice.

Mini Jam 83.           Theme: Dread       Limitation: Dice

Update Version 1.01 - Reduced dice speed. Reduced time limit to 3mins. Reduced Max points to 100. Fixed taskbar bug, if playing the old version and the game doesn't show up in the taskbar just alt+tab to the game window and it will show up.

As per the rules of the jam, if I were to make any changes i had to keep the original up during voting.
